recipe.title: Biriyani
ingredients: Spices (such as cardamom, cinnamon, cumin, coriander, turmeric, bay leaves, and cloves)
recipe.description: Biriyani is a popular South Asian dish that typically consists of rice, spices, and meat (chicken, beef, or lamb), although there are also vegetarian versions.

recipe.title: Fish curry
ingredients: Fish (such as salmon, cod, or tilapia)
Spices (such as cumin, coriander, turmeric, and mustard seeds)
Spices (such as cardamom, cinnamon, cumin, coriander, turmeric, bay leaves, and cloves)
recipe.description: Fish curry is a popular dish in many countries, including India, Bangladesh, and Sri Lanka.

recipe.title: Chole Bhature
ingredients: Spices (such as cumin, coriander, turmeric, and red chili powder)
Spices (such as cardamom, cinnamon, cumin, coriander, turmeric, bay leaves, and cloves)
recipe.description: Chole Bhature is a popular North Indian dish consisting of spicy chickpeas (chole) served with deep-fried bread (bhature).

recipe.title: Dosa
recipe.description: Dosa is a popular South Indian dish consisting of a thin, crispy pancake made from a fermented batter of rice and lentils.

recipe.title: Pasta
recipe.description: Dosa is a popular South Indian dish consisting of a thin, crispy pancake made from a fermented batter of rice and lentils.

recipe.title: Cake
recipe.description: Cake is a sweet baked dessert that can come in many varieties, such as chocolate, vanilla, or fruit-flavored.

recipe.title: Ramen
recipe.description: Ramen is a Japanese noodle dish that is typically served in a meat or fish-based broth and topped with ingredients such as sliced pork, dried seaweed, and green onions.

recipe.title: Pizza
recipe.description: Pizza is a popular dish that consists of a flatbread topped with sauce, cheese, and other ingredients.

recipe.title: Salad
recipe.description: Salad is a dish made from a mixture of raw or cooked ingredients, typically vegetables, that are combined and served cold or at room temperature.

recipe.title: Omlette
ingredients: Vegetables (optional, such as bell peppers, onions, mushrooms)
Meat (optional, such as ham or bacon)
recipe.description: An omelette is a dish made of beaten eggs cooked in a frying pan, usually with additional ingredients such as cheese, vegetables, or meat.

recipe.title: Pulao
ingredients: Whole spices (such as cinnamon, bay leaves, cardamom, cloves, and cumin seeds)
Vegetables (such as carrots, peas, and potatoes)
Meat (optional, such as chicken or lamb)
recipe.description: Pulao is a type of rice dish that is popular in South Asian cuisine. It is made by cooking rice and various ingredients, such as vegetables, spices, and sometimes meat, in a seasoned broth
